Name: Lemon Tart
Ingredients: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and half lemon or lime slice wheel.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with lemon or lime slice on rim.
Review: This bittersweet aperitif harnesses the herbal bitterness of gentian root with gin's botanical notes.
Nutrition: One serving of Lemon Tart contains 127 calories
